author: rjung
msg: Only use new API for configurable session cookie,
if it is available. Try to stay runtime compatible
The method using the API is deprecated anyways.

author: norman
msg: Use SearchCriteria when searching in ldap tree. This prevent a NPE in Active Directory (JAMES-1020). Thanks to Jeff Huff for this patch!

author: norman
msg: Fix wildcard matching for domains (JAMES-1019). Thanks to Jeff Huff for reporting
